name: LEGO Star Wars: The Quest for R2-D2
name_original: LEGO Star Wars: The Quest for R2-D2
description:
LEGO Star Wars: The Quest for R2-D2 is an arcade game developed by Three Melons. It came out on 19-10-2009. It was published by Three Melons. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
LEGO Star Wars: The Quest for R2-D2 is available on PC.
